attributes.name: value
attributes.title: Value
attributes.description: The HTML value attribute of the text field

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.title: Autofocus
attributes.description: Determines if the element should receive document focus on page load

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.title: Placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the placeholder value of the element, generally used to provide a hint to the user

attributes.name: type
attributes.title: Type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of text input for the field

attributes.name: list
attributes.title: List ID
attributes.description: Allows associating a datalist to the component

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.title: Maximum length
attributes.description: The maximum number of characters a user can enter

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.title: Minimum length
attributes.description: The minimum number of characters a user can enter

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.title: Validation pattern
attributes.description: A regular expression that the value must match to pass validation

attributes.name: size
attributes.title: Size
attributes.description: Sets the width of the element to a specified number of characters

attributes.name: spellcheck
attributes.title: Spellcheck
attributes.description: Controls whether or not to enable spell checking for the input field, or if the default spell checking configuration should be used

attributes.name: name
attributes.title: Name
attributes.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

attributes.name: required
attributes.title: Required
attributes.description: Require the field to be completed prior to form submission

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the number field

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.title: Readonly
attributes.description: When true, the control will be immutable by user interaction

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The content of the radio represents its visual label

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the option content

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the option content
